message.content:
cs.DB, cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SY. 

This paper deals with enforcing policies in database-backed applications, which is a topic that falls under the database (cs.DB) and security and privacy (cs.CR) sub-categories. The paper also discusses the challenges of separating policy from code, which is a software engineering (cs.SE) concern. The framework presented in the paper involves modulating database access and imposing finer-grained constraints, which are programming language (cs.PL) and systems and control (cs.SY) topics.
